text: You might remember I made a short music video for Mother 3 earlier this year and I felt like doing more of them. There are no intentions behind this except simply having fun. For some reason, I also decided to impose a rule on myself to not use the game's music. A lot of you know about my Relaxin' with SD playlist, so I created a new one: Feelin' it with SD.

author: Slaphappy

text:
This game has been both a blessing and a curse to me as a gamer.
A blessing because it was way more than I ever expected from it.
A curse because all the other OW games I've played after it have felt underwhelming to some degree.

BOTW just... broke the game.
